snippet: As a child, I saluted our Founding Fathers by eating peanut soup in Colonial Williamsburg. But there's something to be said for the usual Independence Day fare: hot dogs, beer and perhaps a wine punch.
abstract: As a child, I saluted our Founding Fathers by eating peanut soup in Colonial Williamsburg. But there's something to be said for the usual Independence Day fare: hot dogs, beer and perhaps a wine punch.

headline.main: Wine Punch (and Peanut Soup?) for the Fourth
